author: maxime
msg: * code split into clean libraries and utilities :

author: dims
msg: - With the change in setting deployment scheduler task to daemon, programatically starting SimpleHTTPServer was failing as all threads are now daemons, fix for that is to make the primary thread that loops around the socket accept as a non-daemon thread.
- Took the opportunity to clean up the output messages and arguments as well.

author: tellison
msg: Added extra regression test for HARMONY-21
